aboutme.bio:
Han Solo, along with his friend Chewbacca, was hired by Obi-Wan Kenobi and Luke Skywalker to provide passage to Alderaan. Han boasted that his starship, the Millennium Falcon, could make the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs; whether that was true is unknown, but he needed the job. The smuggler was deep in debt to crime lord Jabba the Hutt, who had placed a bounty on his head. In a sit-down standoff at the Mos Eisley cantina, Han blasted Greedo, one of Jabba’s bounty hunters looking to collect a handsome sum for the Corellian. He later had a run in with the gangster himself, convincing Jabba to give him more time -- though it would cost 15% extra.

The group departed Tatooine, blasting their way out past Imperial stormtroopers who were searching for Luke’s droids. On the trip, it became clear that Han didn’t believe in the Force, saying, “There's no mystical energy field that controls my destiny.” Finally, they arrived at Alderaan -- or where Alderaan should have been. It had been completely blown away by the Empire’s Death Star, and the Millennium Falcon was soon caught in the space station’s tractor beam. On the Death Star, they rescued Princess Leia Organa -- with whom Han bickered intensely -- but lost Obi-Wan. 

They escaped to Yavin 4, location of the hidden Rebel base, and delivered stolen Death Star plans to the Alliance. While the fledgling group was planning an attack on the Imperial outpost, Han collected a reward for rescuing the Princess and planned to leave -- a decision that disappointed his new friends. “I know what I’m doing,” he told Chewbacca. Toward the battle’s end, with Luke about to be blasted by Darth Vader, Han and Chewie returned in the Millennium Falcon. They cleared the TIE fighters off Luke’s tail, and he delivered a precise shot, destroying the dreaded Death Star.
aboutme.homepage_hello: Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side.
aboutme.name: Han Solo

notable_work.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the universe from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.
notable_work.name: A New Hope

notable_work.description: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.
notable_work.name: The Empire Strikes Back

notable_work.description: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader shake off of the dark side of the Force.
notable_work.name: Return of the Jedi

aboutme.resume_intro: I'm a pilot with experience in getting goods from one part of the galaxy to the other. I once made the Kessel Run in 12 Parsecs. Lately I'm looking for something with a little more adventure. Saving a princess perhaps.

-JgKUZ115I0R3OjzZ4Vk.description: Just some pics of me hanging out, looking cool. My favorite one is of me and my buddy Lando. That guy, can you believe he turned us in to Darth Vadar? He said he didn't have any choice.

images.caption: That Billy Dee, what a jokester.

-JgKUZ115I0R3OjzZ4Vk.name: Portraits of me

-JgKWPcHdjyAXDUE7BGE.description: Someone told me about this movie Spaceballs. I guess they thought it was funny. I dunno, Bill Pullman? You think he looks like me?
-JgKWPcHdjyAXDUE7BGE.name: Spaceballs

-JgKRC_yuYQYKYPyPVjx.description: Han Solo: Lady's Man for All Seasons is an essay by Sherry Magee about the appeal of Han Solo and his portrayal in fiction that has a romantic focus. In it, the author discusses a number of current stories.
-JgKRC_yuYQYKYPyPVjx.name: Han Solo: Lay's Man for All Seasons

-JgKRVkSd3-8qpy-viRQ.description: Essayist Ashley Cardiff makes an astute observation about Star Wars in her new book Night Terrors. In an essay titled “Nightmares,” she points out how, as children, we go from loving Luke Skywalker to loving Han Solo.
-JgKRVkSd3-8qpy-viRQ.name: 5 Reasons Why Han Solo is the Most Realistic Person in Star Wars

-JgKRjRrDt6ErWz-SjPc.description: "Han shot first" is a phrase referring to a controversial change made to a scene in Star Wars (1977), in which Han Solo (Harrison Ford) is confronted by the bounty hunter Greedo (Paul Blake) in the Mos Eisley cantina.
-JgKRjRrDt6ErWz-SjPc.name: Han Shot First

twitter.name: hansolo
twitter.text: I just realized that I'm probably going to die in the sequel trilogy.

-JgKOvMBMZjM8I1GGvYW.name: Adam Savage's One Day Builds: Han Solo's DL-44 Blaster

url_of_your_video.description: Adam has constructed a Blade Runner pistol and Indiana Jones' revolver, but not Han Solo's blaster from Star Wars A New Hope. Fortunately, the makers at the Replica Prop Forum have thoroughly researched the details of this prop and have faithfully recreated the components needed to build it.

-JgKS7WPZKj6LWCeYO1H.name: Star Wars: The Han Solo Affair

url_of_your_video.description: Viral short, produced for LEGO and Lucasfilm to promote Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones. Stop-motion animation. Produced 2002 At time of release, this was only the second time in Star Wars history that a short film had been produced under license, preceding the Clone Wars shorts, and following the Boba Fett cartoon from the Star Wars Holiday Special, way back in 1977.

general.site_message:
# Webhook solo blogger theme This theme is meant to be used primarily by solo bloggers looking to mix in some videos, photos and links from around the web. To make it really awesome, you can **optionally** set up auto-importing so that it passively adds content to your stream. ## How to set up auto-importing (optional).
Setting this up requires no code experience. You just need to follow the instructions and be careful that you type in things exactly as shown. It should take you about 15 minutes if you've never done anything like this before.
Below is a brief guide to setting up your site to auto-import content from your other social services as you post to them. It's only requirement is that you set up a free [Zapier](http://www.zapier.com) account. You'll also need your Webhook API Key, which is provided in your [backups and data page](/) ### 1. Create a free Zapier account. [Zapier](http://www.zapier.com) is a service that allows you to link one service (like YouTube) to another (in this case Webhook). Their free plan allows for 5 services to be attached along with 150 data-pushes. This should be enough for most sites using this theme. ### 2. Create zaps for the services you wish to add. Each time you create a zap, you'll want to select the service you want to import from (in this case Twitter) and have it post to a Webhook. ![](http://www.webhook.com/webhook-uploads/1417714786521_Screen%2520Shot%25202014-12-04%2520at%25209.39.25%2520AM.png) ### 3. Configure the post action
Don't forget to test your Zap before turning it on. If your zap works correctly it should update data in your CMS.
For each service you need to configure the post action to align with your forms in Webhook. Below are screenshots of the settings you'll need for each service. ##### Twitter Setting this up will make it so that you your latest tweet shows up on your site. You may also want to set up a "Filter" ``` URL SETTING: https://server.webhook.com/update-item/?site=MY_SITE_NAME_HERE&apiKey=MY_API_KEY_HERE&type=twitter&id=twitter ``` ![](http://solo-data.webhook.org/webhook-uploads/1422038268497_Image%25202015-01-23%2520at%252010.37.21%2520AM.png) ##### YouTube or Vimeo This will add YouTube or Vimeo videos to your site as you post to those services. Note that you can use the filter settings to tailor which videos appear. ``` URL SETTING: https://server.webhook.com/add-item/?site=MY_SITE_NAME_HERE&apiKey=MY_API_KEY_HERE&type=video ``` ![](http://solo-data.webhook.org/webhook-uploads/1422038722274_Image%25202015-01-23%2520at%252010.44.36%2520AM.png) ##### Pinboard or Delicious This will make it so that the bookmarks you add to one of these services get added to your links section. You can also set up a filter to check for "Tags" that "Contains" a word. ![](http://solo-data.webhook.org/webhook-uploads/1422039110546_Image%25202015-01-23%2520at%252010.51.18%2520AM.png) ## Don't forget to deploy your site! If this is your first time using Webhook, remember that you need to deploy your website before it's available live to others. You can do this by running `wh deploy` in your site directory or by using the Webhook app. Once deployed your site will live at `yoursitename.webhook.org`. After it's deployed go to the domain section of your CMS to attach a custom domain.

controls.help: This information will show up on your homepage as well as in your site's header.
controls.label: Homepage
controls.name: homepage

controls.help: Should be squarish. We'll crop this down to a  circle for your homepage.
controls.label: Picture of you
controls.name: picture_of_you

controls.help: We'll use your initials to build a small circular logo.
controls.label: Initials
controls.name: initials

controls.help: This is a short intro to welcome users to your homepage. Keep it short.
controls.label: Homepage hello
controls.name: homepage_hello

controls.help: The below information will show up on your About Me page.
controls.label: About me page
controls.name: about_me_page

controls.help: A largish, wide image of you. Will show up on your about page.
controls.label: Bio picture
controls.name: bio_picture

controls.help: Tell us who you are.
controls.label: Bio
controls.name: bio

controls.help: If you'd like to link our to your other online personas, simply add the username for the service below.
controls.label: Online personas
controls.name: online_personas

controls.help: All of this is totally optional. But we can build out a mini-resume for you if you want to fill out the stuff below.
controls.label: Mini Resume
controls.name: mini_resume

controls.help: Can be a PDF or Doc or whatever you want to use.
controls.label: Formal resume
controls.name: formal_resume

controls.help: Name of the project or place of work.
controls.label: Name
controls.name: name

controls.help: You can write in whatever time format you want.
controls.label: Time period
controls.name: time_period

controls.help: What was your role or title?
controls.label: Role
controls.name: role

controls.help: Optional link if needed.
controls.label: URL
controls.name: url

controls.help: You can drag and drop to sort objects.
controls.label: Notable work
controls.name: notable_work

controls.help: The short description of this article.
controls.label: Deck
controls.name: deck

controls.help: For image alignment, use [full],[center],[left] and [right]. Example `![center](myimage.jpg)`
controls.label: Body
controls.name: body

controls.help: Add an image ONLY if you want to use a featured"Big Hero" image at the top.
controls.label: Optional big hero image.
controls.name: optional_big_hero_image

controls.help: Images can be reordered by dragging. The first image in the list will be the one used for click-throughs.
controls.label: Images
controls.name: images

controls.help: The title of the page you're linking to.
controls.label: Name
controls.name: name

controls.help:
Set up a Zapier task to automatically add links from your [Delicious](https://delicious.com/) or [Pinboard](https://pinboard.in) accounts. You can restrict it to only a certain tag (like "to_website" or "share"). [Here are some 5-minute instructions to set it up](http://solo.webhook.org/setup/).

You can of course manually add a new link to your site using the below fields.
controls.label: Optional: Link up your Delicious or Pinboard account
controls.name: optional_link_up_your_delicious_or_pinboard_account

controls.help: Twitter username, minus the @ symbol.
controls.label: Name
controls.name: name

controls.help:
If you just want to use the twitter widget, add your twitter name above and hit save below. You don't need to fill in anything else.

Optionally, you can set up a Zapier task (the free tier is enough) to auto-update your last tweet's details to the below fields. It will give you more control over just what tweets show up here (only ones based on a filter..etc) and also look a little prettier and load faster. [Here are some 5-minute instructions to set it up](http://solo-data.webhook.org/setup/).
controls.label: Twitter Widget or Custom Widget?
controls.name: twitter_widget_or_custom_widget

controls.help: Your last tweet's message.
controls.label: Text
controls.name: text

controls.help: The link to your tweet.
controls.label: URL
controls.name: url

controls.help: The time your tweet was posted to twitter.
controls.label: Created at
controls.name: created_at

controls.help: Your avatar image.
controls.label: User profile image url
controls.name: user_profile_image_url

controls.help: The number of followers you have.
controls.label: User followers count
controls.name: user_followers_count

controls.help: The URL to the twitter user's profile.
controls.label: User url
controls.name: user_url

controls.help: Use this field if you just want to add a video manually into your feed. We'll grab all the details from the URL you post below.
controls.label: Option 1: Manually add a video
controls.name: option_1_manually_add_a_video

controls.help: The URL of the video you want to add. Something like `https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XLxGQAgD3mA`
controls.label: URL of your video
controls.name: url_of_your_video

controls.help: Using Zapier (their free tier will be enough) you can auto-add videos from YouTube or Vimeo. The following fields will be filled in as they get added. [Here are some 5-minute instructions to set it up](http://solo-data.webhook.org/setup/).
controls.label: Option 2: Use Zapier to auto-add videos.
controls.name: option_2_use_zapier_to_autoadd_videos
